abilities.abilityShortText: On charge, 2+ to deal D3 mortal wounds
abilities.abilityFullText: Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model makes a charge move. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Daemonbound Blade is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

effects.effectText: Attack inflicts 1 mortal wound in addition to normal damage

abilities.abilityShortText: At end of combat, if models were slain by Hexed Battle-axe, heal D3 wounds
abilities.abilityFullText: At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this modelâ€™s Hexed Battle-axe in that phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.
Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.

abilities.abilityShortText: Reroll charge rolls and +1 to hit for a KNIGHTS or CHARIOTS unit
abilities.abilityFullText: You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly CHAOS KNIGHTS, CHAOS CHARIOTS or GOREBEAST CHARIOTS unit wholly within 18" of a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for that unit and add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn.

abilities.abilityShortText: On charge, roll dice equal to charge. Each 6 = 1MW
abilities.abilityFullText: After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the charge roll for that charge move. For each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.abilityShortText: Roll a dice for each unit with 6" of a terrain feature 6 within 6". 3+ = D3 mortal wounds.
abilities.abilityFullText: In your hero phase, pick 1 terrain feature within 6" of this model and roll a dice for each other unit within 6" of that terrain feature. On a 3+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
